parameters: \c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]This is strange, what is this place?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I heard that Zhao Xiaojuan used to work in a photo studio.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Officer, you tend to keep your thoughts in your mind.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]You can tell me if something's wrong.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ms. Chen...\.\.I hope you won't mind what I'm about to say.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I think you know the Tian family too well.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It seems to me that you've gone out of your way to investigate them.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]You had come to Qingtan and \c[1]covered a story\c[0] previously, right?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]You seem to know a lot.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]You are right, I was a \c[1]newspaper journalist\c[0] before coming here as a volunteer teacher.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]After the case occurred, I investigated the Tian family. It was an old habit from my previous job.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]That's why you said you'd send the evidence you found to the press.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Since I've spilled the beans about myself.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Can you tell me how you found out about my previous visit to Qingtan to cover a story here?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Hey, you can't do that, I answered your question!
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I think I heard the sound of a camera shutter.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ms. Chen, let's investigate this place first.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Okay. You have to answer my question after the investigation is done.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]A question for a question, it's fair!
A decorative door with a bouquet hanging from it.
A decorative door with a bouquet hanging from it.
A decorative door with a bouquet hanging from it.
A toy dog that can make noises.
A toy dog that can make noises.
A toy dog that is popular among children.
A vase of flowers in full bloom is on the chair.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]There is a photo coming out down there.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]What the heck is in this photo!?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]...It's a photo sticker, it’s popular these days. When I was in university, girls in my class loved taking these.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]The theme of the photo was set in advance.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Why do students like this kind of thing nowadays?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I don't look good in the photo, it makes me look fat.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ms. Chen, look, in this photo there's something behind us...
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]But there are no frames in the backdrop.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Maybe something's wrong with the backdrop.
The most popular photo sticker machine lately.
A lot of my memories with Tian Yu are left here.
These memories seem sweet, but unlike photos, they can't be preserved forever...
A lot of my memories with Tian Yu are left here.
These memories seem sweet, but unlike photos, they can't be preserved forever...
A photo sticker machine that's popular lately.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]The backdrop is made of paper...
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]Xiaojuan, look at the house my dad built for us, it's so spacious.
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]This place has great Feng Shui too, you can see mountains and waters as you open the window.
Press \BK[2]\PK[1] to paste the backdrop fragment.
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]Hmm...\.\.It looks a bit empty, I think we should get some \c[1]flowers and plants\c[0] to decorate it.
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]Xiaojuan, you're a photographer, so you understand this better than I do. Can you take care of this?
The room looks a bit empty, it'd be better to decorate it with flowers and plants.
Find more flowers to decorate the room.
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]The room looks a lot better now, you're definitely professional!
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]Oh yes, Xiao Juan, the baby is about to come to the world, we have to prepare some \c[1]small toys\c[0].
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]You have good taste, pick some toys!
We have to prepare toys for the child.
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]Xiaojuan, thanks for the hard work, our kid will love it.
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]By the way, my parents mentioned that you were probably exhausted running the photo studio alone.
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]You can move to my hometown, then you can focus on caring for our kid.
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]Don't worry about money, my dad has asked someone to find me a job.
\c[2]Tian Yu \c[0]I'll start earning money once I start the job.
My past is riddled with holes.
There is a basket of flowers in full bloom on the ground.
A vase of flowers in full bloom.
A cute doll. Children love to take pictures with her.
